title: Internal Flood PRA Schema
description: JSON schema for the Internal Flood Probabilistic Risk Assessment Model

internal-flood-plant-partitioning.description: Details the partitioning of the plant into different zones for flood analysis.

internal-flood-sources-identification-an.description: Identifies and characterizes potential sources of internal flooding.

internal-flood-scenarios-development.description: Develops scenarios for internal flooding based on identified sources and plant partitioning.

internal-flood-initiating-events.description: Lists and describes initiating events for internal flood scenarios.

internal-flood-plant-response.description: Analyzes the response of the plant systems to internal flooding events.

internal-flood-human-reliability-analysi.description: Assesses the reliability of human actions in response to internal flooding.

internal-flood-event-sequence-quantifica.description: Quantifies the event sequences resulting from internal flood initiating events.
